CONEJOBEAT

A series of virtual raves hosted by Sofa, myself, and the Conejo Committee at large in Second Life. I call them raves, but over time they’ve grown to be more like audiovisual art shows—each one with more and more artistic curation and planning than the last.

Conejo Committee

The Conejo Committee inhabits and maintains Conejo Island, a virtual commune in Second Life founded by my close friend Sofa. The island is divided into several smaller parcels of land owned by different residents, each with their own unique flavour and decorations.
